title: Organizational Learning Strategies at Trade Expositions

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Training program focused on strengthening practical organizational learning capabilities at trade exhibition sites for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interactions between micro/macro business networks in a trade fair setting.
Learners can design organizational learning strategies based on trust-building mechanisms across network types (strong/weak ties).
Through project-based assessment, learners can execute knowledge-sharing and collaboration processes in a trade fair simulation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
